verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He is exalted, the king is exalted on high.
I will praise Him.
He is exalted, forever exalted.
And I will praise His name!
He is the Lord, forever His truth shall reign.
Heaven and earth, rejoice in His holy name!
He is exalted, the King is exalted on high!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Es exaltado, por siempre exaltado en los cielos.
Le alabare.
Es exaltado por siempre exaltado.
Y yo le alabare.
El es Se√±or, su verdad reinara por siempre.
Cielos y tierra, regocijensen en Su nombre,
Es exaltado, por siempre exaltado, el Rey.
